original_text: And with them Heman and Jeduthun with trumpets and cymbals for those that should make a sound, and with musical instruments of God. And the sons of Jeduthun were porters.
korean_text: 또 그들과 함께 헤만과 여두둔을 세워 나팔과 제금들과 하나님을 찬송하는 악기로 소리를 크게 내게 하였고 또 여두둔의 아들에게 문을 지키게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And with them Heman and Jeduthun
for those that should make a sound
and with musical instruments of God
And the sons of Jeduthun were porters
